data.name: Starena
data.detailed_description:
INTRODUCE

STARENA is a voxel style BOSS challenge ARPG that focuses on stage performance.
As an intelligent machine gladiator, you fight against the machinery and creatures across the universe, and win spectators' cheers, support, and bounties. Your goal is to become a champion.

BACKGROUND

The universe is peaceful. People are idle and boring. They are all keen on more exciting entertainment activities, and the gladiatorial contest is one of them. J3, the intelligent machine gladiator who have won many championships, is planning to participate in the most popular gladiatorial contest in a space station called STARENA. In this gladiator contest, J3 will face unprecedented challenges...

FEATURES

Fighting on stage

The audience will react differently depending on your performance. You need to meet the unreasonable demands of the audience. They may cheering and throwing gold coins, throwing special gifts at you. If you fight negatively, they'll throw rubbish at you, even hit you with rocks.

Fans system

Increase number of your fans by fighting:
+ You're going to get a higher popularity rank in the arena.
+ There will be more and more audience in combat.
+ New fans of different races across the universe will come to see you.
+ You can build your own fan-support team and get helpful item from fans in battle.

Destructible BOSS parts

Every boss has some parts to break. For example, if you think that boss’ Gatling looks good, then you can try to cut it down, and then immediately pick it up and firing bullets at boss.
Different bosses have different designs for destructible parts:
+ Destroys the defensive components and makes boss more vulnerable.
+ Destroys moving parts and lowers boss speed.
+ Break the cockpit and let the driver of the machine boss fall out.
+ And more…

Voxel weapon building

You can combine different parts to build sword of different shapes and properties.
At the end of the game you can even customize each cube into a weapon, getting a unique weapon appearance.

data.short_description: STARENA is a voxel style BOSS challenge ARPG that focuses on stage performance. As an intelligent machine gladiator, you fight against the machinery and creatures across the universe, and win spectators' cheers, support, and bounties. Your goal is to become a champion.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows xp,7,8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows xp,7,8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
